Module guigame
Package guigame.logic.players

Class Player

java.lang.Object
guigame.logic.players.Player
Direct Known Subclasses:
ArtificialIntelligencePlayer, HumanPlayer
public abstract class Player
extends java.lang.Object
Abstract of a player. Contains all functionality that is shared by HumanPlayers AND ArtificialIntelligencePlayers.
See Also:
HumanPlayer, ArtificialIntelligencePlayer

  • Field Details

    • catchUpRegex

      public static java.lang.String catchUpRegex
      Current player has less points than other player.

      NAME_AKTUELLER_SPIELER holt mit PUNKTE_AKTUELLER_SPIELER Punkten auf!

      Params:

      1. name of current player

      2. points of current player

    • catchedUpRegex

      public static java.lang.String catchedUpRegex
      Both players have the same points.

      NAME_AKTUELLER_SPIELER hat ausgeglichen, es steht PUNKTE_AKTUELLER_SPIELER:PUNKTE_AKTUELLER_SPIELER!

      Params:

      1. name of current player

      2. points of current player

      3. points of current / opponents player (equal)

    • pullingAwayRegex

      public static java.lang.String pullingAwayRegex
      Current player has more points than other player.

      NAME_AKTUELLER_SPIELER zieht mit PUNKTE_AKTUELLER_SPIELER Punkten davon!

      Params:

      1. name of current player

      2. points of current player

  • Constructor Details

    • Player

      public Player​(java.lang.String name, int y)
      Create a new player with a name and an initial y-offset. Its beginning score (points) is 0.
      Parameters:
      name - the initial name for the player
      y - the initial y-offset for the player('s paddle)

      Returns:
      the player's name

      Parameters:

      public void addPoint()
      Give the player one more point.

    • addPoints

      public void addPoints​(int add) throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
      Give the player add points additionally.
      Parameters:
      add - the number of points to add
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

    • isAI

      public abstract boolean isAI()
      Returns:
      Whether the Player is an AI or not (so a human)

    • getPointWinningTextAgainst

      public java.lang.String getPointWinningTextAgainst​(Player player)
      Parameters:
      player - the player who lost the last point
      Returns:
      a nice sounding message to tell the Players which one of them has won the last point.
